    • Method Detail

      • upload

        boolean upload(java.lang.String destination,
               java.lang.String... paths)
        Uploads destination files to chosen path. Zips(default zip name) if more than one file
        Parameters:
        destination - - where to upload
        paths - - file paths to upload
        Returns:
        true - if successful

      • upload

        boolean upload(java.lang.String destination,
               java.lang.String zipName,
               java.lang.String... paths)
        Uploads destination files to chosen path. Zips(given zip name) if more than one file
        Parameters:
        destination - - where to upload
        zipName - - Name of zip
        paths - - file paths to upload
        Returns:
        true - if successful

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true - if successful

      • addMeta

        void addMeta(java.lang.String path,
             java.lang.String key,
             java.lang.String value)
        Adds meta (key-value pair) to chosen file
        Parameters:
        path - - of file you want to add meta
        key - - key value of meta
        value - - value for that key

      • getMeta

             java.lang.String key)

        Parameters:
        path - - of file you want to get meta
        key - - key value you want to search with
